cause.description:
I've noticed that the Mainstream media really only gives good credit to liberals and secularists. The only major network that really gives conservatives and religions equal credit is FOX News.
1. The Liberal Mainstream Media Slanders Conservatives and Christians/Jews
2. FOX News is the best major network EVER!!
3. The Liberal Media only puts in as much christian content as needed to keep christians watching their network
cause.mission: To educate the public about the secularity and bias in the Mainstream Media
cause.name: Mainstream Media Lies!!!!!
